title: chum_yum
author: chum_yum
created_time: November 08, 2022, 03:49:55 PMLast edit: November 10, 2022, 11:13:41 AM by chum_yum
content: According to the actual rules, this topic is created for the purpose of supporting users interested to join 3DPass official airdrop campaign performing off-site: https://3dpass.org/distribution.html#airdrop. Feel free to ask your questions here, but kindly post your applications over Discord: https://discord.gg/u24WkXcwug in the #airdrop channel. Applications posted here are not valid. 3DPASS AIRDROP CAMPAIGNBudget: 20 000 000 P3D Rules:ETH and BTC holders are able to get x100 P3D to the amount they actually have. Example: If you have 1 ETH, you can get 100 P3D, provided there are still funds enough in the budget.Blockchain captured at the hight of: - ETH 15917962 block- BTC 762120 blockAll BTC and ETH transfers happened after the blocks mentioned above are not valid.Every 10 days there is an Airdrop event. How to Apply:1. Prove that you have some ETH or BTCSign your ETH or BTC address with the wallet signature. Add your P3D address to the message like that:Code:-- Start message --<ETH ADDRESS><P3D ADDRESS> -- End message ---- Start ETH wallet signature --<ETH SIGNATURE>-- End ETH wallet signature --2. Join 3DPass Discord https://discord.gg/u24WkXcwug and post your message and signature in #airdrop channel.3. Wait for the upcoming Airdrop event to come and check your P3D balance. --Official web-site: https://3dpass.orgWhite paper: https://3dpass.org/3DPass_white_paper.pdfOfficial thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5382009.0Discord: https://discord.gg/u24WkXcwug
